params.buyer: Buyer address (unused in flat fee model)
params.fiatAmount: Amount of fiat in cents (unused in flat fee model)
params.isPublic: Whether order is public or private
params.token: Token address - used to determine fee in correct units
params.tokenAmount: Amount of tokens being traded (unused in flat fee model)

getFeeRate().details: Note: This returns USDC units, not basis points like before

returns._0: Flat fee in USDC (6 decimals) - e.g., 20000 = 0.02 USDC

getPrivateFeeRate().details: Note: This returns USDC units, not basis points like before

returns._0: Flat fee in USDC (6 decimals) - e.g., 10000 = 0.01 USDC
Price in USDC (e.g., 3000 for WETH means 1 WETH = 3000 USDC)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newPrice: New price, e.g., 100000 means 1 BTC = 100000 USDC
New price, e.g., 3000 means 1 ETH = 3000 USDC

params.newFee: New fee in USDC units (6 decimals), e.g., 10000 = 0.01 USDC
New fee in USDC units (6 decimals), e.g., 20000 = 0.02 USDC

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateFee(uint256,uint256,address,add.notice: Calculate flat fee for a trade

constructor.notice: Initialize the fee calculator with default values

getFeeRate().notice: Get public order flat fee in USDC units

getPrivateFee(address).notice: Get flat fee for a specific token (private orders)

getPrivateFeeRate().notice: Get private order flat fee in USDC units

getPublicFee(address).notice: Get flat fee for a specific token (public orders)

getTokenPriceUsdc(address).notice: Get USDC price for a token

isTokenSupported(address).notice: Check if a token is supported for fee calculation

privateFeeUsdc().notice: Flat fee for PRIVATE orders in USDC units (6 decimals)

publicFeeUsdc().notice: Flat fee for PUBLIC orders in USDC units (6 decimals)

setBtcPrice(uint256).notice: Update BTC price in USDC (for fee conversion)

setEthPrice(uint256).notice: Update ETH price in USDC (for fee conversion)
